data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Howard is in the intermediate math class at his high school. He ____ difficulty ____ the ____ for a long ____. But ____, ____ has ____ working ____ harder ____ improve ____ grades. His teacher says that his progress is very promising.
data.partBlankContent: Howard is in the intermediate math class at his high school. He h__ difficulty wi__ the sub____ for a long ti__. But rece____, h_ has be__ working mu__ harder t_ improve h__ grades. His teacher says that his progress is very promising.
data.answer: 霍华德在他的高中上中级数学课。很长一段时间他学这门课都很困难。但最近，为了提高成绩，他更加努力了。他的老师说他的进步很有希望。
